question: What is the name of the mobile app launched by the Government to facilitate 'One Nation-One Ration Card'?
explanation:
The Government of India has launched a mobile app named “Mera Ration” with an aim to facilitate the 'One Nation-One Ration Card' system in the country.
The app has been developed by NIC and is aimed to help especially those ration card holders who move to new areas for livelihoods.
